Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Kratidas. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, CEALEX DI 0494, which has a star symbol at the left. Ink, deleted, '36'.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (148)
